data.name: Akoum
data.oracle_text:
Players may cast enchantment spells as though they had flash.
Whenever you roll {CHAOS}, destroy target creature that isn't enchanted.

data.name: Akoum Battlesinger
data.oracle_text:
Haste
Whenever Akoum Battlesinger or another Ally enters the battlefield under your control, you may have Ally creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

data.name: Akoum Boulderfoot
data.oracle_text: When Akoum Boulderfoot enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to any target.
data.flavor_text:
"If you're in Akoum and you glimpse a shadow overhead, the worst thing you can do is duck."
—Chadir the Navigator

data.name: Akoum Firebird
data.oracle_text:
Flying, haste
Akoum Firebird attacks each combat if able.
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {4}{R}{R}. If you do, return Akoum Firebird from your graveyard to the battlefield.

data.name: Akoum Flameseeker
data.oracle_text: Cohort — {T}, Tap an untapped Ally you control: Discard a card. If you do, draw a card.
data.flavor_text: In the face of extinction, the most perilous endeavors can be cause for hope.

data.name: Akoum Hellhound
data.oracle_text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Akoum Hellhound gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: Hellhound packs roam the Spikefields, basking in the harsh sunlight and lighting the night with their flames.

data.name: Akoum Hellkite
data.oracle_text:
Flying
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Akoum Hellkite deals 1 damage to any target. If that land is a Mountain, Akoum Hellkite deals 2 damage instead.

data.name: Akoum Refuge
data.oracle_text:
Akoum Refuge enters the battlefield tapped.
When Akoum Refuge enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {B} or {R}.

data.name: Akoum Stonewaker
data.oracle_text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {2}{R}. If you do, create a 3/1 red Elemental creature token with trample and haste. Exile that token at the beginning of the next end step.

data.name: Moraug, Fury of Akoum
data.oracle_text:
Each creature you control gets +1/+0 for each time it has attacked this turn.
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, if it's your main phase, there's an additional combat phase after this phase. At the beginning of that combat, untap all creatures you control.
